00009 void pose2dToFrameKdl(const Pose2D& pose2d, KDL::Frame& pose) {
00010     pose = KDL::Frame(KDL::Rotation::RPY(0, 0, pose2d.getTheta()), KDL::Vector(pose2d.getX(), pose2d.getY(), 0));
00011 }
00012 
00013 void twist2dToTwistKdl(const Twist2D& twist2d, KDL::Twist& twist) {
00014     twist = KDL::Twist(KDL::Vector(twist2d.getX(), twist2d.getY(), 0), KDL::Vector(0, 0, twist2d.getTheta()));
00015 }
00016 
00017 
00018 #endif  /* CONVERSIONUTILS_H */
